definitions.title: adj. num. ordin. sixth
definitions.body: ;—[[יוֹם הַשִּׁשִּׁי]]([[הַ]]) Ge 1:31 + 5 t., etc.; [[בַּשָּׁנׇה]] [[הַשִּׁשִּׁית]] Le 25:21, Ez Eze 8:1, etc.; cstr. [[שִׁשִּׁית הַהִין]] Ez Eze 4:11 6th part of the hin, cf. Eze 45:13, Eze 46:14; read ´[[שׁ]]: also Eze 45:13 b (v. [[[שִׁשָּׁה]]] infra).
